# sectionIdentifier(containingItem:)

**Instance Method**

Returns the identifier of the section containing the specified item in the snapshot.

## Declaration

```swift
func sectionIdentifier(containingItem identifier: ItemIdentifierType) -> SectionIdentifierType?
```

## Parameters

- **identifier**: The identifier of the item contained in the section of the snapshot.

## Return Value

The identifier of the section containing the specified item, or `nil` if the specified item doesn’t exist in any section of the snapshot.

## Identifying items and sections

- **itemIdentifiers**: The identifiers of all of the items in the snapshot.
- **sectionIdentifiers**: The identifiers of all of the sections in the snapshot.
- **indexOfItem(_:)**: Returns the index of the item in the snapshot with the specified identifier.
- **indexOfSection(_:)**: Returns the index of the section of the snapshot with the specified identifier.
- **itemIdentifiers(inSection:)**: Returns the identifiers of all of the items in the specified section of the snapshot.
